mainHero.title: Jorge Mendes
mainHero.subtitle: Mendes Tecnologia
mainHero.description: Full Stack Sênior Developer, building responsive applications with great layouts and excellent experience.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hello, I'm Jorge, a web developer with 10 years of experience in the market. Throughout my career, I have gained a deep understanding of the technologies and programming languages necessary to develop high-quality applications and websites. My ability to create efficient and effective solutions is one of my most valued strengths by my employers and clients.

Since the beginning of my career, I have focused on staying up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in the web development industry. I am an avid participant in developer forums, conferences, and workshops, which allows me to stay in touch with other developers and learn new techniques and skills.

One of my most notable skills is my ability to translate client needs into an efficient technology solution. I am an excellent communicator and know how to listen and understand client needs to create a personalized and unique solution. This makes me a highly valued professional by my clients and companies that hire my services.

I am also highly efficient in working as part of a team. I understand the importance of collaboration in achieving common goals and work well with other developers and team members. I am able to contribute positively to team dynamics, bringing creative ideas and solutions to the challenges the team faces.

In addition to my technical skills, I am known for my exceptional work ethic. I am always willing to take on challenges and work hard to deliver projects on time and within budget. I am known for my reliability and commitment to excellence in everything I do.

In summary, I am a highly experienced, competent, and committed web developer. My vast experience, technical skills, effective communication, and work ethic are attributes that make me a valuable resource for any web development team.

journeyInfo.title: Professional experience
journeyInfo.description: Here are the places I've worked during my career.

journey.institution: Centro Paula Souza - Etec São Roque

journey.description: Worked as a freelance web developer, that built institutional websites and on free time make computer maintenance.

journey.institution: São Paulo State Department of Education
journey.description: My responsibilities have always been to take care of public property, establish contact between students and school management, resolve conflicts between teachers and students.

journey.institution: SRTI - São Roque technology of information
journey.description: I worked in the development of web applications, responsive websites, mainly with front-end development.
I worked Assisting in the development of email marketing and functional responsive websites, tailored for our customers.
I worked developing products and internal solutions for the company and clients, updating the products that already existed.

journey.institution: FDTE - Foundation for the Technological Development of Engineering
journey.description: I work as a consultant, on projects, being a full-stack developer, thus being part of the workforce of these clients, as well as on projects, building resources, bug fixes, refactoring and rebuilding when necessary.
Working as reference in front-end development, building feature for a company that exists on 5 contries.
Working as developer on a growing product.

footer.title: Build with Vite + React and love.
